publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1036 Ms Sandra White: Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Armyâ€”That the Parliament notes the intention of the Salvation Army to mark the 10th anniversary of the Fair Trade movement by working towards a Fair Trade policy covering all its centres; further notes that this Christian organisation serves a cup of tea or coffee every 30 seconds and is the largest provider of care, second only to the government, and congratulates the Salvation Army for providing a positive example which is consistent with its Christian outlook and encourages other organisations to follow its lead.
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Michael Matheson*

S2M-1036 Ms Sandra White: Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army-That the Parliament notes the intention of the Salvation Army to mark the 10th anniversary of the Fair Trade movement by working towards a Fair Trade policy covering all its centres; further notes that this Christian organisation serves a cup of tea or coffee every 30 seconds and is the largest provider of care, second only to the government, and congratulates the Salvation Army for providing a positive example which is consistent with its Christian outlook and encourages other organisations to follow its lead. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Fiona Hyslop*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael McMahon*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Nora Radcliffe*

S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mark Ballard*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Shiona Baird*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Frances Curran*, Jim Mather*, John Swinburne*, Eleanor Scott*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Rob Gibson*, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Robin Harper*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1036 Adoption of Fair Trade Policy by the Salvation Army (lodged on 10 March 2004) Elaine Smith*
